title: Harold and the purple crayon
creator_credit: David Piel, Robert Sagalyn, Stanley Flink and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: One evening, Harold decides to go for a walk in the moonlight, but there isn’t any moon, so he takes his purple crayon and draws one. As Harold draws his way out of adventure, children become fascinated by the wondrous magic of his purple crayon. Based on the book by Crockett Johnson. Narrated by Norman Rose. Suitable for primary school level.
